items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t sleep because the neighbor\'s dog barked all night.
I could\'ve tried harder to get along with everyone in the class.
I didn\'t know I was going to have to introduce the main speaker.
I didn\'t know that Tom talked about me like that behind my back.
I\'d like to find out how Tom is getting along with his new boss.
I let Tom know that I wasn\'t happy with the way he was behaving.
Tom told everybody at work that he and Mary were getting married.
Tom didn\'t get off the airplane with the rest of the passengers.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to admit that he had made a mistake.
Why isn\'t the smoke going up the chimney like it\'s supposed to?
